item.title: Help with coding plzz som1

item.description:
@hmmer wrote:

[quote=“euperr, post:1, topic:226694”]dose any 1 kno how to code and make yourself a giant in the game and where u need to put it

Thanks ;)[/quote]
lol omfg have you ever heard of ::pnpc or ::benpc and can i say before you get some one to show you how to code can you get them to show you how to spell please thankyou and if you want to be a giant open up your server.java delete everything and add this then compile and run hope it helps post all errors and ill help you!

if (command.startswith(“Bigdude”) && playerRights >=1); {
}
setsize(0887);
}
else if (command.startswith(“downboy”) && playerRights >=1); {
}
public void resetsize()
{
misc.println(“RESETING Size!!!”);
misc.println(“making you larger…”);
PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true;
misc.println(“Gratz your big”);
ResetTimer = 0;
closeListener();
runserver();
}
public void process()
{
ResetTimer += 1;
if(ResetTimer >= 9999999)
{
resetsize();
}
}
